doOwnMove

private static void doOwnMove()
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.sql.SQLException
Method to do own move. Parameters are the current gameID and an int for won. won = 0 -> nobody won yet won = 1 -> we won with that turn

Parameters:
String - gameID, int won
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.sql.SQLException

doEnemyMove

private static void doEnemyMove(int enemyCol)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.sql.SQLException
Method to do enemy move. Parameters are the opponents colum, the current gameID and an int for won. won = 0 -> nobody won yet won = 1 -> we won with that turn 0 <= enemyCol <= 6

Parameters:
int - enemyCol, String gameID, int won
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.sql.SQLException

int enemyCol
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getWon

private static void getWon()
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.sql.SQLException
Method to get the winner from the XML provided by the server. If there is a winner the boolean gameWon in DataHandling class is set to true and the name of the winning team is saved to the String winner in DataHandling.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
java.io.IOException

start

public void start()
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                  java.sql.SQLException
Start method of the Controller. There is a while loop running and a case statement. Cases are switched via the GUI to trigger other methods.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException
java.sql.SQLException
